name: The End Is Nigh (itch) (Esmeralda)
description:
Aliens landed in the little victorian town of Dimpleworth!

This is a (very) short point&click adventure game made for the MadeWithVisionaire #2 game jam in 2019 in one week with the Visionaire Engine.

The Theme was "connected worlds".

I ran out of time and had to cut some ideas, but I hope you like it despite of the somewhat rambling dialogs. After the Jam I added some music and did some polishing.

Credits:

Music: freemusicarchive.org:

"Crystal Echos" and "Fog" by Sergey Cheremisinov CC by 4.0

"Sonatina" and "Nothing Broken" by Kevin MacLeoad CC by 3.0

SFX: freesound.org

Made with Visionaire Studio

additional script (item scrolling) by SimonS

Controls:

leftclick: use, pick up, talk to

rightclick: look at

mousewheel - scroll items of your inventory

inventory : move cursor to the lower edge of the screen

ESC: menu (no save or load)

English or German texts (not voiced)
